actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the restrictions on the types of medical care that the uniformed services may provide, directly or by contract, to dependents of members of the uniformed services.

summary.text: Amends the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services (CHAMPUS) to eliminate specified restrictions on the provision of medical and dental care to military dependents. Authorizes the giving, rather than merely loaning, of durable equipment and authorizes contracts for the services of Christian Science practitioners and nurses.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the restrictions on the types of medical care that the uniformed services may provide, directly or by contract, to dependents of members of the uniformed services.
